name: Dungeon Survivors (rv215)
description:
Controls:

  • WASDQE for movement
  • LMB to shoot
  • SPACE to dash
  • 1 for Heavy Machine Gun
  • 2 for Shotgun
  • 3 for Pistol
  • 4 for Eight Way Shot
  • Esc to pause

Project was made using Phaser 3 and TypeScript.

This starting project was used when creating the game: https://github.com/geocine/phaser3-rollup-typescript#readme

Credits:

credits to: 

0x72 for the sprites (character, dungeon)

cafeDraw for the Card Sprites

kb3k for the music:

ABC 8 bit cover

Playing God 8 bit cover
